PSCT.Base: Special Summon 1 "ZW -" or "ZS -" monster from your hand, then, if you control a "Utopia" monster, you can make all monsters you currently control become all Level 4 or all Level 5. During your Main Phase, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish 1 "ZW -" or "ZS -" monster and this card from your GY, then target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it. You can only use each effect of "Zexal Catapult" once per turn.
